Rule.Description: Checks that stubs are not being confused with mocks.
Rule.Name: Do Not Confuse RhinoMocks Stubs With Mocks
Rule.Resolution: Do not invoke Rhino Mocks 'VerifyAllExpectations' on a stub in method '{0}' for instance variable '{1}' Change the stub to a mock.
Do not invoke Rhino Mocks 'Exepct' on a stub in method '{0}' for instance variable '{1}' Change the stub to a mock.
Do not invoke Stub on a mock in method '{0}' for instance field '{1}'. Change the mock to a stub.
